name: Universal Cross Battle REMIX: UTA Challenger Pack Free DLC
name_original: Universal Cross Battle REMIX: UTA Challenger Pack Free DLC
description:
Fighters from the UTA Challenger Pack (TheChibChibi, Lost Soul, Ria, Spirit Shift, Treble, Kuroko) are now available. If you want more characters added to this game, then donate to my Patreon or Ko-Fi. If you wanna play just with the base roster, then you can find the original versions in Newgrounds or itch.io. Links to them are provided down below.

Links to…

Base game on Itch.io: https://jeiarrshi.itch.io/ucbremix

Base game on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/848936
